data.name: SelectTopDkimNoSpfSenders
data.value: SELECT top10.source_ip, SUM(`full_compliance_count`) `full_compliance_count`, SUM(`dkim_only_count`) `dkim_only_count`, SUM(`spf_only_count`) `spf_only_count`, SUM(`untrusted_email_count`) `untrusted_email_count`, SUM(`trusted_email_count`) `trusted_email_count`, SUM(`disposition_quarantine_count`) `disposition_quarantine_count`, SUM(`disposition_reject_count`) `disposition_reject_count`, SUM(`disposition_none_count`) `disposition_none_count`, SUM(`total_email_count`) `total_email_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_count`) `aggregate_report_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_record_count`) `aggregate_report_record_count` FROM derived_aggregate_daily_senders_top10_rollup top10 JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON top10.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE top10.dkim_only_top10 = b'1' AND dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY top10.source_ip ORDER BY dkim_only_count DESC LIMIT 10;

data.name: SelectTopSpfNoDkimSenders
data.value: SELECT top10.source_ip, SUM(`full_compliance_count`) `full_compliance_count`, SUM(`dkim_only_count`) `dkim_only_count`, SUM(`spf_only_count`) `spf_only_count`, SUM(`untrusted_email_count`) `untrusted_email_count`, SUM(`trusted_email_count`) `trusted_email_count`, SUM(`disposition_quarantine_count`) `disposition_quarantine_count`, SUM(`disposition_reject_count`) `disposition_reject_count`, SUM(`disposition_none_count`) `disposition_none_count`, SUM(`total_email_count`) `total_email_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_count`) `aggregate_report_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_record_count`) `aggregate_report_record_count` FROM derived_aggregate_daily_senders_top10_rollup top10 JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON top10.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE top10.spf_only_top10 = b'1' AND dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY top10.source_ip ORDER BY spf_only_count DESC LIMIT 10;

data.name: SelectTopTrustedSenders
data.value: SELECT top10.source_ip, SUM(`full_compliance_count`) `full_compliance_count`, SUM(`dkim_only_count`) `dkim_only_count`, SUM(`spf_only_count`) `spf_only_count`, SUM(`untrusted_email_count`) `untrusted_email_count`, SUM(`trusted_email_count`) `trusted_email_count`, SUM(`disposition_quarantine_count`) `disposition_quarantine_count`, SUM(`disposition_reject_count`) `disposition_reject_count`, SUM(`disposition_none_count`) `disposition_none_count`, SUM(`total_email_count`) `total_email_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_count`) `aggregate_report_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_record_count`) `aggregate_report_record_count` FROM derived_aggregate_daily_senders_top10_rollup top10 JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON top10.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE top10.full_compliance_top10 = b'1' AND dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY top10.source_ip ORDER BY full_compliance_count DESC LIMIT 10;

data.name: SelectTopUntrustedSenders
data.value: SELECT top10.source_ip, SUM(`full_compliance_count`) `full_compliance_count`, SUM(`dkim_only_count`) `dkim_only_count`, SUM(`spf_only_count`) `spf_only_count`, SUM(`untrusted_email_count`) `untrusted_email_count`, SUM(`trusted_email_count`) `trusted_email_count`, SUM(`disposition_quarantine_count`) `disposition_quarantine_count`, SUM(`disposition_reject_count`) `disposition_reject_count`, SUM(`disposition_none_count`) `disposition_none_count`, SUM(`total_email_count`) `total_email_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_count`) `aggregate_report_count`, SUM(`aggregate_report_record_count`) `aggregate_report_record_count` FROM derived_aggregate_daily_senders_top10_rollup top10 JOIN derived_user_domain_rollup_permissions dudrp ON top10.domain_id = dudrp.domain_id WHERE top10.untrusted_email_top10 = b'1' AND dudrp.user_id = @userId AND effective_date BETWEEN @begin_date AND @end_date AND ((@domainId IS NULL AND dudrp.rollup = 1) OR dudrp.domain_id = @domainId) GROUP BY top10.source_ip ORDER BY untrusted_email_count DESC LIMIT 10;
